songs.title: About “Thinking Of You” - Commentary
songs.lyrics: "Thinking Of You" is - it is a breakup song, and it's kind of like a sweet song, except for it's actually a total fuck you song. Um, because I had a breakup where I was like, so heartbroken over somebody, and he was such a jackass, he cheated on me, it was terrible, and then, then now all of a sudden he's an AMYF. It's very sweet revenge.
